fields.summary: iOS: UI - Email/SMS Dialog does not change orientation properly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
When you create a window and set win.orientationModes = [Titanium.UI.PORTRAIT]; or set it in Tiapp.xml. Then create an emailDialogue or SMSDialogue and open that window. If you proceed to rotate the device into LANDSCAPE the window itself rotates into LANDSCAPE but the statusbar and keyboard remain in PORTRAIT

Also see Q & A 

http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/130482/emailsms-dialog-do-not-display-properly-on-orientation-change-ti-18--ios

for further details
fields.summary: Build 1.8x when app is locked into PORTRAIT and then opening emailDialogue or SMSDialogue and then rotating the phone to landscape the emailDialogue window rotates but status bar and keyboard remain in PORTRAIT
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio 1.0.7
Mobile Build 1.8.0.1
MAC OSx 10.6
iOS 5.0.1 iphone 4
xcode 4.2 iOS 5

comments.body: This issue was related to TIMOB-7627 which is now fixed. I am marking this issue as resolved.
